name: It's The Aroma for me
description:
LEFT CLICK - SLOW-MOTION (USE IT TO REPOSITION YOURSELF BEHIND YOUR                                                                         SWORD TO FEND OFF FLIES)

ARROWS AND WASD - MOVE YOUR COFFEE CUP

TRY AND GET AS MANY POINTS AS POSSIBLE BY KILLING FLIES

GAIN AROMA  AND TASTE TO BECOME THE BEST COFFEE!!

TIPS :

Aroma

AROMA -  GIVES YOU A SHIELD (ONLY WORKS IF THE CURRENT SHIELD IS BROKEN)

THE TEA BAG - GIVES YOU HEALTH

KNOCKBACK - THERE IS MORE KNOCKBACK WHEN DEALING DAMAGE THAN RECEIVING IT

!!!!!!!
